name: AMERICANS FOR TRANSPARENCY AND ACCOUNTABILITY
description: Organization which promotes an informed debate about U.S. foreign policy
sampleDescriptions: To provide strategic counsel and advocacy on issues impacting U.S. foreign policy generally, and other issues of importance to Americans for Transparency and Accountability.
